article_title: Developing Obamacare's Health Care Exchanges Has Cost More Than Apple's Original iPhone

article_metadata.description: This is a stunning number from Farhad Manjoo over at the Wall Street Journal. The development cost of the health care exchanges necessary under the ACA (aka Obamacare) is larger than the development cost of the original iPhone at Apple. Indeed, by some estimates it might be four times the [...]
article_metadata.author: Tim Worstall
